document.full_text: rising u.s. bond yields have more to do with improving economic growth prospects and market concerns about inflation rather than washington's deteriorating fiscal position, the international monetary fund said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. debt position not a factor in yield rise: imf
lines_and_colors: rising u.s. bond yields have more to do with improving economic growth prospects and market concerns about inflation rather than washington's deteriorating fiscal position, the international monetary fund said on wednesday.
